mapper.select: select g.gid,s.sid, g.gtitle1,g.gtitle2,g.privilege, g.img, g.text, g.gsoldcount, g.gprice1, g.gprice2, m.b_retime, m.d_taocan, (select count(gid) from meituan_collection where gid = #{gid}) collectCount from meituan_seller_info s inner join meituan_goods_info g on s.sid = g.sid inner join meituan_goods_intro m on g.gid = m.gid and g.gid = #{gid}
mapper.update: update meituan_goods_info set gsoldcount = gsoldcount + #{ocount} where gid = #{gid}
